biotools.summary: Statistical tools for building random mutagenesis libraries for prokaryotes. The package has functions for handling the occupancy distribution for a multinomial and for estimating the number of essential genes in random transposon mutagenesis libraries.

bioschemas.name: occugene
bioschemas.summary: Statistical tools for building random mutagenesis libraries for prokaryotes. The package has functions for handling the occupancy distribution for a multinomial and for estimating the number of essential genes in random transposon mutagenesis libraries.
